front.title: Out Of Commission & Transmission Terminated
front.gametext: USED: Use 1 Force to randomly place one card in opponents Lost Pile out of play.  LOST: Cancel one hologram. OR Use 4 Force. Draw destiny. Add 1 to destiny for each asteroid sector on table. If total destiny> 3, Imperial Holotable site is 'blown away' (opponent loses 4 Force).
